actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to require that income levels for the SSI-related medically needy are the same as those for the SSI-related categorically needy.

summary.text: Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to require that income levels for the supplemental security (title XVI of the Act) income-related medically needy (those individuals whose income and resources place them slightly above automatic eligibility) be the same as those for the supplemental security income-related categorically needy (those individuals who are automatically eligible).

titles.title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to require that income levels for the SSI-related medically needy are the same as those for the SSI-related categorically needy.
